snippet.title: Nordic Warriors Official Trailer
snippet.description:
NOW AVAILABLE ON STEAM: Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1174670/Nordic_Warriors/

Also Available on:
Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/nordic-warriors
Green Man Gaming: https://www.greenmangaming.com/games/nordic-warriors-pc

FOLLOW us on:
Discord: http://rebrand.ly/NWDiscord
Twitter: http://rebrand.ly/NWTwitter
Instagram: http://rebrand.ly/NWInstagram
Facebook: http://rebrand.ly/NWFacebook
Tumblr: https://rebrand.ly/NWTumblr
Merch: http://rebrand.ly/NWMerch

-----------------------------------
Inspired by the classic game "Myth", Nordic Warriors is a Real Time Tactical game set in a world descending into an existential struggle for survival. You'll need smart strategy combined with tactical skills to survive the onslaught of undead hordes and their sorcerer allies. Come face to face with heroes, legends, demons and gods as you fight through the middle world and even enter the gates of Hel itself.

Do you have what it takes to survive Ragnarok?

Embark on a journey and experience overwhelming encounters facing various undead enemies as you struggle for survival. Use smart strategy combined with tactical skills to complete different mission objectives and advance your way in the game. Follow the storyline and reveal a shocking secret that’s been hidden for many years. 

Mystical beings, undead warriors, hellish monsters and underworld creatures - You’ll face them all! But… Are you ready for them?

------------------------------
Mashmashu studio is a very small indie studio built of 2 people and a hired freelancer. We're working from our home with zero financial support. We are now working on our largest project yet - Nordic Warriors, hoping that its success will allow us to create more awesome games in the future.

#RealTimeTactics #IndieGames #NordicWarriors #letsplay #StrategyGames #GamesForMac #UnrealEngine
